name: WoPo Toolkit
author: WoPo

sections.description:
WoPo Toolkit plugin has a lot of functions help you customize your WordPress site and other plugins function. WoPo Toolkit plugin provides solutions and features for other themes or plugins:

WordPress

  1. Disable password change ( New )
  2. Add line break to Post’s excerpt

Woocommerce

  1. Keep only first product tab
  2. Show Biographical Info and Profile Picture on My Account
  3. Hide Choose an option
  4. Search product only
  5. Change to product search form
  6. Product gallery zoom
  7. Change Add to cart button to Update cart if product added to cart

Dokan

  1. Change number vendor per page
  2. Disable Ensure vendor coupon

NBDesigner

  1. Show Popup after process
  2. Add stylesheet inline block for NBdesigner swatch
  3. Change NBdesigner main color
  4. Show NBdesigner Bulk Variation vertical
  5. Show NBdesigner Printing Options 2 to label
  6. Move Start Design button to left side of Clear Selection button
  7. Change login popup to My Account for Image upload required function
  8. Scrollable printing option on Mobile device
  9. Blur license key input
  10. Move Design Category to top of sidebar on templates page
  11. Hide Products widget of sidebar on templates page
  12. Alway on top
  13. Hide process button

Teepro theme

  1. Hide User Menu when click outside
  2. Add Policy Widget
  3. Change single product for NBDesigner Visual Design editor layout

PrintShop theme

  1. Show Our Capabilities on Mobile

Tools

  1. Save and restore actived plugins
  2. Record updated plugins
  3. View phpinfo() & imagick
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wopo-toolkit directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘WoPo Toolkit’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the WoPo Toolkit screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
I have a suggestion for the plugin. How should I contact you?

We are always looking for feedback from you. Whether itâ€™s a completely new plugin or adding some custom functionality to any existing plugin, we are always ready to do that. You can contact us at wopoweb@gmail.com
sections.changelog:
1.2.0

Disable password change option

1.1.0

add line break to post’s excerpt

1.0.13

Test new wordpress version and change color options

1.0.12

Added: View phpinfo() & imagick

1.0.11

Added: Record updated plugins tool & Hide process button for NBDesigner

1.0.10

Added: Disable Ensure vendor coupon for Dokan & Change Add to cart button to Update cart if product added to cart for WooCommerce

1.0.9

Added: Save and restore actived plugins Tools & Product gallery zoom for WooCommerce

1.0.8

Added: Search product only & Change to product search form for Woocommerce
Updated: Option title

1.0.7

Add new option Alway on top for NBDesigner

1.0.6

Add new option Change single product for NBDesigner Visual Design editor layout

1.0.5

Add new option Hide Products widget of sidebar on templates page

1.0.4

Add new option Show Our Capabilities on Mobile for PrintShop theme + Add Policy Widget for Teepro Theme

1.0.3

Add new option Move Design Category to top of sidebar on templates page

1.0.2

Add new option Scrollable printing option on Mobile device + Blur license key input for NBDesigner

1.0.1

Add new option Change number vendor per page for Dokan

1.0

First release
